text:
Thank you <@UFBNA9K9A>. I was afraid about that.
So if I do an app/integration, will the API limit apply as global or will be based on client/portal?

Hi HubSpot developers,
We are working on an app that uses webhooks to send message to our server.

Currently we use hard coded domain to our test server, but I want to be able be able to use different domain for the testing and production environments, is there are way to do that?

Hey folks, if we use the chat widget sdk and show the widget for logged out users AND also logged in; does the HubSpot api alias the original session automatically? <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/conversation/visitor-identification>.

I have set up a TEST version of my app that sends to my dev domain, which I (painstakingly, manually) keep in sync with my real App. It was the first thing I could think of that seemed like it could work and it has been roughly ok so far.
Anyone know the timeout on CRM card data fetch requests? Asking for a friend. Couldn't find it in the docs.
Hi <@U01D07LQBB5> I am removing this message above as it seems it may have been posted in error and contains personal information.

Itâ€™s a bit hidden in the Webhooks tab on the <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/extensions/custom-cards|doc>. Request timeout overall is 5 seconds, the connection has to be made within 3 seconds within that

Hey everyone, I would like to use the webhooks API to be notified of changes to custom deal properties. Do I need to install my test app in the connected apps section of my organization's HubSpot portal before creating subscriptions for custom properties?

Hey I am using the `Automation API (v4)`  and described <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/automation/custom-workflow-actions|here>.

I am having trouble getting a `booleancheckbox` to work. The documentation suggests that I can get a it to appear inside my custom workflow action input fields.

Here is what I have when I GET my definition:
```...
{
            "typeDefinition": {
                "name": "preventsDuplicateMessages",
                "type": "bool",
                "fieldType": "booleancheckbox",
                "options": [],
                "optionsUrl": null,
                "referencedObjectType": null
            },
            "supportedValueTypes": [
                "STATIC_VALUE"
            ],
            "isRequired": true
        }
...```
But this is what shows up:
If anyone knows what I am missing, let me know, thanks!
